# Security Policy

## Supported versions

We provide security updates for the latest `v1` release line.

## Report a vulnerability

Use the [Security Vulnerability template](https://github.com/stuchain/CuePoint/issues/new?template=security_vulnerability.yml).

Please do not report security issues publicly via GitHub Issues or Discussions.

## What to include

- A short description
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact

## Response targets

- Critical: 24 hours
- High: 7 days
- Medium/Low: 30 days
